channel.title: STILL having connection problems D: Need Help
channel.description: well i still cant get onto my server, it says its listening on port 43594 for like 5-10 mins it then goes to say 0 players online and then i run my client and no responce... any help for connectivity i do have teamviewer any help will be appreciated

item.description:
@tompacman wrote:

oo i just edited my last post here ill jsut make it new reply

//PlayerSaving.initialize();
//MysqlManager.createConnection();
/**
* Server Successfully Loaded
/
System.out.println(“Server listening on port 127.0.0.1:” + serverlistenerPort);
/*
* Main Server Tick
*/

	 /*try {

Database.init();

} catch (Exception e) {

e.printStackTrace();

is that what you need?
or this

static {
if(!Config.SERVER_DEBUG) {
serverlistenerPort = 43594;
} else {
serverlistenerPort = 43594;
}
cycleRate = 600; //was 474, needs to be 600
shutdownServer = false;
engineTimer = new SimpleTimer();
debugTimer = new SimpleTimer();

item.title: STILL having connection problems D: Need Help
item.dc:creator: @Onix Onix
item.description:
@Onix wrote:

[quote=“tompacman, post:3, topic:444621”]i run my client and it says no responce everytime, where should i look for the port in client.java?
also its on local host 127.0.0.1 is that correct?[/quote]Yes, that’s the correct IP, and the port should be 43594 by default. Could you copy and paste the errors, if any, from your server and client console. You can do this by right clicking the console and pressing the ‘Enter’ key to copy the contents, then paste them here.

Read full topic

item.title: STILL having connection problems D: Need Help
item.dc:creator: @Onix Onix
item.description:
@Onix wrote:

When it says listening to port, that means the server is running. Also make sure the client is connecting to your loopback adapter / localhost on the same port as the server(43594).

Read full topic
